flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to get an oil change every 3000/1000 = <<3000/1000=3>>3 months
So he gets 12/3 = <<12/3=4>>4 oil changes a year
That means he pays for 4-1 = <<4-1=4>>4 oil changes a year
So he pays 4*$50 = $<<4*50=200>>200 a year
#### 200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
